3198.60.text:
had been doing,
as well as some Air Force work

3204.20.text:
well, down in the
Edwards Air Force Base

3206.67.text:
were other organizations
that got rolled up

3212.27.text:
And so my question to you is,
first of all, is that true?

3215.10.text:
And second, how much
of that heritage

3218.20.text:
actually made it into
NASA as well?

3220.80.text:
You know, as I work with
the range organizations--

3226.43.text:
and I think of those
as Dryden and Wallops--

3228.57.text:
there seems to be quite
a different philosophy,

3230.70.text:
a more rocketry-oriented
philosophy in those guys

3233.80.text:
than we see in a lot
of the other centers.

3235.70.text:
- The base in Marshall,
Marshall being

3238.00.text:
where the rockets
were being built,

3242.10.text:
And, in a sense, JPL got rolled
into NASA eventually,

3246.03.text:
you know, a bit later
than the others.

3248.33.text:
So--and the JPL folks
had been focusing

3250.83.text:
on military activities
of various kinds.

3254.60.text:
Those are the two
that I know of

3263.43.text:
Goddard Space Flight Center
wasn't created

3266.37.text:
until well after
NASA was created.

3270.60.text:
- I was thinking more of
Goddard the rocket scientist

3274.43.text:
Did that all get captured
in the NASA organization?

3276.17.text:
- Well, that came in
through von Braun.

3279.47.text:
- Werner von Braun and his group
of, what was it,

3283.23.text:
20 or 30 people were brought
over from Germany

3289.50.text:
And they became the nucleus
of the Marshall Center.

3295.07.text:
- And I think a piece
of the Navy vanguard activity

3297.53.text: got rolled into it as well.

3301.03.text:
- But NACA had the predominance
of the workforce.

3304.40.text:
And so NACA owned
the prominence--

3309.63.text:
Incidentally, you should never
say "naca" to a NACA person.

3313.83.text:
'Cause at Langley Field,
they used to be

3316.47.text:
called the "naca nuts,"
you know, around the community.

3320.87.text:
- Well, thank you all
for listening.

3322.37.text:
And thank you, Walter and Jack
and Vic, for speaking with us.
